notes.text: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
The message strip of the list report is now recreated when the list report is reopened after going to the home page
We now ensure that the bindingInfo path of the chart is correct on the object page
Selection mode now works correctly in a list report with multi-entity sets
We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a chart
Design-time cards can now be shared correctly using SAP Collaboration Manager
Tables in the analytical list page now provide a Show Details link for subtotals with various units
We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
We now properly send `null` when clearing a nullable field
The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors
We now ensure that extended semantic date operators work correctly after the app is reloaded
Weâ€™ve now enabled the date picker with a minimum allowed date and a maximum allowed date
We've resolved an issue where the custom text defined for the empty title of the object page wasn't appearing correctly
We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
We now ensure that the override execution of the onPageReady method is reverted from AfterAsync to After
We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
